title: Understanding movies
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Motion picture industry - Study and teaching

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
description: Presents a study of motion picture technique through excerpts from the MGM films: Tennessee Johnson, The Good Earth, Treasure Island, David Copperfield and, Romeo and Juliet. Highlights directing, acting, photography and editing as well as art and music. All excerpts from pictures produced and copyrighted by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer.
